name: Polskie Stowarzyszenie Przemysłu Kosmetycznego i Detergentowego
headAddress: Polskie Stowarzyszenie Przemysłu Kosmetycznego i Detergentowego
goal: We opperate to support entrepreneurs operating in Poland to follow both EU and national industry legal requirements. We take part in consultation processes while the industry law is to be changed.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Internal Market
euInitiatives: All initiatives and files related to cosmetic and detergent legislation.
